summary: A mod made for the youtuber \'Chayification\'. This is my first house mod and features everything a Dovahkiin needs. Ranging from storage to crafting to a place to stay for the night. Free of charge. I swear. Don\'t question the Lord! He won\'t make you pay your precious gold. Have a nice stay.
descriptionHtml:
Not updated for a few weeks because currently I got quite a few exams. The last one is on the 23rd so hopefully I can get back to polishing the mod then. Might be a few updates every so often before though.

Contact me at:
Twitter: Ninjaofsomewhere (@Ninja_Somewhere)
Nexus: Just send me a PM on the forums
Steam and Youtube: Ninjaofsomewhere

Thanks to everyone who endorsed! :D
[Img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/4608987-1364195280.jpg[/Img]

A mod made for Chayification over on Youtube at his request. 
The house is located on an island off the coast of Raven Rock in Solstheim and therefore obviously requires the Dragonborn DLC. Refer to the images for the location. 
At this was made for one person in mind, but made public, some parts of the mod may not appeal to you. 
This house was made with a mage character in mind, but there is still storage for weapons and plenty of places to craft. So this should be fine for all types of characters.

Requirements:
Dragonborn. Yeah that\'s it. Have fun.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/4608987-1364196332.jpg[/img]
If you make a video about this mod and want it featured here, post in the comments with a link and I\'ll check it out.

Thanks to Chayification for the great video!
[youtube]U-46CSHEaHg[/youtube]

[Img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/4608987-1364195841.jpg[/img]

Need a place to stay and don\'t want to pay those hefty inn prices (10 gold)? 
Need a place to store all your precious loot that you \'found\' traveling that wasteland called \'Solstheim\'?
Need a place to be anti-social in Skyrim and hide from all those peasants who don\'t worship you at all?
Well then this house is what you may or may not have been what your looking for! 

This is my first house mod and features everything a Dovahkiin needs. Ranging from storage to crafting to a place to stay for the night. Free of charge. I swear. Don\'t question the Lord! He won\'t make you pay your precious gold!

This mod was constructed by the dedicated (oppressed) Peasents of Chayification, countless hours have gone in to the construction of Lord Chay\'s Manor and it is finally complete. And available for your dragonborn needs.

I do want to point out this mod is not fully complete, but I feel it is at a stage where it can be uploaded. In the next update, if you have stored any books in the library I would remove them as the update will be replacing the bookshelves. If there is any other updates, I would suggest checking the mod page to make sure it will not remove any of your stuff. Report any issues to via twitter, PM or in the comments.

[IMG]http://i1279.photobucket.com/albums/y521/Ninjaofsomewhere/Deed_zpsc4442f4d.png[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1279.photobucket.com/albums/y521/Ninjaofsomewhere/Featuresheading_zps9a4ba609.jpg[/IMG]

1 Large Player Home
    -1 Throne
    -1 Library
    -1 Forge
    -1 Master Bedroom
1 Camp Site
2 Forges
2 Tanning Racks
3 Enchanting Tables
3 Alchemy Tables
1 Staff Enchanter
1 Smelter
2 Grindstones
24 Bookcases
Many chests for all that precious loot.
Food! For everyone!
1 Peasents Quarters
1 Guards Quarters
1 Stewards room
1 Throne for your Lordly pleasure
9 Display cases
And more!

[IMG]http://i1279.photobucket.com/albums/y521/Ninjaofsomewhere/Futureupdatesheading_zps600cde4c.jpg[/IMG]

Several NPC\'s (Peasants, Guards and Steward)
More clutter
Dragon priest mask stands (Requested)
Optional Guild member files (Will add several guild members and you can choose which ones to add)

[IMG]http://i1279.photobucket.com/albums/y521/Ninjaofsomewhere/KnownissuesHeading_zps5705740d.jpg[/IMG]

The \'Lord\'s Arcane Sword\' runs out of charge quickly and does no frost damage. (At least for me)

The mannequin\'s may move. I recommend using this mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652

As of the 1.5 update, the markers in the library collide with the player allowing them not to work in certain small spaces.

If you encounter anymore issues, please inform me of them over twitter, through a message, or in the comments section. Try to be as clear and detailed as possible so I can fix any issue quicker or offer a fix for the problem.

[IMG]http://i1279.photobucket.com/albums/y521/Ninjaofsomewhere/Changelogheader_zps00cde9d2.jpg[/IMG]

Version v1.7

--FANCY CANDLE HOLDERS! Added to the entrance to the bedroom of the Master Bedroom cell. Gotta stay classy after all. ;D  
--Weapon racks added to Library for you staffs and what not...  
--Sound added to the outdoor campfire because you know... Wood, burning, tends to make a noise. 
--Bookshelf marker issue fixed. You WON\'T have to remove books from the shelves. Don\'t hate me... D:  
--Note: Top area of bedroom now changed. I am blank with ideas for there, leave suggestions in the description if you have any. Please do, my mind can\'t think for itself sometimes...  

Version 1.6

--The fire pit and shrines in the shrine area have been centered because I am a picky bastard. :3 
--Light has been added to the outdoor campfire and it looks AMAZING! (For me at least) :D  
--More Clutter has been added to the Library, ENJOY YOUR BOOKS!  
--Tanning rack. Enchanting table. Grindstone. All rearranged. Exciting? I know! Such enthusiasm. (Requested)  
--Woodcutter\'s Axe and a pile o\' wood added to the forge.  

Version 1.5

--Two lights have been removed from the Lord\'s Quarters, and the intensity of the lights has been reduced. Enjoy reading your secret stash in better lighting.  
--Bookshelf added to the storage space of the Lord\'s Quarters. Because... MOAR BOOKS! >:D  
Three unnecessary doors in the throne room cell of the Manor have been removed. Enjoy my good friends!  
--Weapon racks added to the Lord\'s Quarters. Now you can show off your weapons to your book club like a real man! Or cat... Or Lizard man... Or creepy elf people (excluding Bosmer)... BOSMER FOR RULERS OF TAMRIEL! :D  
--Bookcases in the Library replaced with book cases as originally planned. (DISCLAIMER: Remove any books from bookcases before updating as they will be lost (DISCLAIMER: Don\'t blame me! Please! I beg of you!))  

Version 1

-Initial Release. And YES! I did re-do the change log because I\'m bored and it\'s 3 in the morning :D 
 
[IMG]http://i1279.photobucket.com/albums/y521/Ninjaofsomewhere/CreditsHeader_zpsf6c7c7b1.jpg[/IMG]

Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation kit.

The Nexus staff for a great website.

TyrannyNexus for navmeshing every cell. (Maker of a great mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29429)

eldiabs for making things so much easier with the mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11618

Chayification for the initial idea.  (http://www.youtube.com/user/Chayification)
author: Randomwolfguy

files.name: The Lords Manor v1_5 -OLD-
files.changelogHtml:
Bookcases in the Library replaced with book cases as originally planned. (DISCLAIMER: Remove any books from bookcases before updating as they will be lost (DISCLAIMER: Don't blame me! Please! I beg of you!))
Weapon racks added to the Lord's Quarters. Now you can show off your weapons to your book club like a real man! Or cat... Or Lizard man... Or creepy elf people (excluding Bosmer)... BOSMER FOR RULERS OF TAMRIEL! :D
Three unnecessary doors in the throne room cell of the Manor have been removed. Enjoy my good friends!
Bookshelf added to the storage space of the Lord's Quarters. Because... MOAR BOOKS! >:D
Two lights have been removed from the Lord's Quarters, and the intensity of the lights has been reduced. Enjoy reading your secret stash in better lighting.

The fire pit and shrines in the shrine area have been centered because I am a picky bastard. :3
